MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone, affecting properties in Cedar Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.29am. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by an underground cable fault at near to Maple Drive substation. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.56am on Monday 22nd March 2021.
